Text: Okay the forum in the link on the friend blaster torrent was for some reason useless. The forum said I had to be a member of the group to view the link. I found this shady. I then tried this and found a  different experience. The forum you linked had another link to a rapidshare file (which is easily monitored thru java). The patch worked fine though, and I retract my previous proclamation of shadiness. Why not just put the patch on the torrent?
